rows.label: qev031103_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh dear. I made a meal of some of the trees in this
district, and the humans yelled at me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0002
rows.name:
Honestly, why have they bothered planting trees here
if they are not meant to be eaten?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev031103_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell the Orphean that the trees
are for viewing, not eating.

rows.label: qev031103_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031103_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask the Orphean whether he knows
anyone well-versed in trees.

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0003
rows.name: Viewing? What a curious concept.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0004
rows.name:
They are not consumed? Not used for materials?
Just...looked at? Honestly, I can think of few
things more superfluous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0005
rows.name:
No Orphean possesses greater knowledge of plants
than the botanist Mon'barac.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0006
rows.name:
At present he is... One moment, please.
I shall track his Ovah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0007
rows.name: ...It seems he is aboard the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0008
rows.name: All trees here are strictly for viewing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0009
rows.name:
I wish that New LA would grow at least some trees
that we Orphe could eat freely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0010
rows.name:
I would dearly like to eat a tree, and yet you humans
insist that the ones you planted for the purpose of
viewing must not be consumed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0011
rows.name: What, then, am I to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev031103_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell the Orphean to look outside the city.

rows.label: qev031103_JNK0040
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev031103_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain that Mon'barac ate a tree and suffered for it.

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I were attacked by the primordial creatures
outside of New LA, I would most certainly die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0013
rows.name:
Incurring such risks is highly illogical when seeking food
for the purpose of sustaining my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0014
rows.name:
A chilling story indeed. I will take care to avoid
Prone women and their flora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031103_MSG0015
rows.name:
Incurring such risks is highly illogical when seeking food
for the purpose of sustaining my life.[ST:wait ]
